# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal: Visor, Crash Helmet

### Reference Information
* Solicitation Number: W8485-258142/B
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2024-06-20
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-22T14:00:00

### Procurement Details
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-07-29
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Regions of Opportunity: Global

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Visors and Crash Helmets to be delivered to 25 Canadian Forces Support Division (CFSD) Montreal by December 2024. Bidders must submit proposals for the following item:

* Item 1, 8415: NSN 8415-01-706-9964 (Visor, Crash Helmet), Quantity: 100, Unit of Issue: EA

### Important Notes
* Due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
